loading.previous_found: We found a previous rewind you did before. Do you want to use it?
loading.wait: This may take a while, please wait
loading.note: Please note that your experience may vary because of your scrobble count, availability of artists and albums, and other factors

errors.private_scrobbles: Your last.fm profile have private scrobbles. Please <1>make them public</1> to continue
errors.rate_limit: There are too many people using this website right now and last.fm is limiting us. Please try again later

first_track.title: The first one
first_track.sub_text_zero: This was your first scrobble of the year, on {{date, datetime}}. You only listened this song once this year.
first_track.sub_text_one: This was your first scrobble of the year, on {{date, datetime}}. You only listened this song one more time this year.
first_track.sub_text_other: This was your first scrobble of the year, on {{date, datetime}}. You also listened this song {{count, number}} more times this year.

top_artists.top: And these were the artists you listened the most
top_artists.bottom: counting up to {{count}} artists this year

top_tracks.top: And these were the tracks you listened the most
top_tracks.bottom: counting up to {{count}} tracks this year

top_albums.top: Finally, these were the albums you listened the most
top_albums.bottom: counting up to {{count}} albums this year

tag_cloud.title: You also listened to different tags, like these ones

popularity.low: <0>{{name}}</0> was your least popular artist of the year, with {{value}}% of popularity
popularity.high: <0>{{name}}</0> was your most popular artist of the year, with {{value}}% of popularity
popularity.subtitle: is how mainstream you were this year*
popularity.note: * based on the average of your top 100 artists of the year, with Spotify's popularity score

end_splash.text: And this was your year on music!

collage.text: And of course, this wouldnâ€™t be a last.fm thing without a an 10x10 album collage

share.title: Share your rewind!
share.text: Show to your friends your 2022 in music with #MusicorumRewind!

finish.title: That was it!
finish.text1: This was your year in music rewinded! We hope you enjoyed this experience!
finish.text2: This website was done by one person. If you liked this and want to see more, share this and give it a feedback! Also, consider joining our Patreon to help fund the development :D
finish.tweet_text: This year I had {{count}} scrobbles on #Lastfm. Take a look at your rewind on #MusicorumRewind by @MusicorumApp

creation.name: My 2022 rewind
creation.description: My most listened tracks from 2022, based on my Last.fm profile, by #MusicorumRewind

created.title: Here's your playlist!
created.missing_one: One song could not be found on {{service}} and is missing: {{names}}
created.missing_other: Some songs were not found on {{service}} and are missing: {{names}}
